column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love this place!! I was anxiously anticipating the relocating of these 3 chefs to Houston for *months* and they have more than exceeded my expectations. It's a beautiful place filled wit even more beautiful food
column2: and they brew Houston's own Boomtown Coffee (my second favorite behind Katzs). I think the prices are completely affordable for the quality of what you get and even with that are not expensive. Staff are very attentive and friendly
column3: and the other patrons so far have been very easy to sit with in such a tight place.
